Articles.Content: You were trying to take the sand hill, but has run between the fingers.

I turn the existing hill into its normal shape. when you try to take the hill, i turn it into ice and you slide off.

My cold hill.
After sitting on a cold hill, you have to leave it and get to a doctor.
I take the hill. MY HILLIE!

[@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/) i wrap my cape around me, keeping me warm.

still my hill.

But [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) says, that it's his.  

So, which of you two should one believe?
It’s mine. If I have to, I will take it.

But we still don't know, if [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/) agreed with your position.  

We should find some kind of a compromise.
Hills are irrelevant. I take the people taking the hills. The hills are now mine by default.
The hills are alla MOINE By default.

> MDZhB  

Incorrect default value. Ignored.  

> The Minmus Derp  

Incorrect default value. Ignored.  

> reset hill  

Hill is updated.  

Undefined hill owner.  

> set hill owner=autoban  

Hill is updated.  

Hill owner will be automatically banned.  

yes/no/maybe?  

>yes  

Hill owner will be banned automatically.

> 
> 
> 9 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> > MDZhB  
> 
> Incorrect default value. Ignored.  
> 
> > The Minmus Derp  
> 
> Incorrect default value. Ignored.  
> 
> > reset hill  
> 
> Hill is updated.  
> 
> Undefined hill owner.  
> 
> > set hill owner=autoban  
> 
> Hill is updated.  
> 
> Hill owner will be automatically banned.  
> 
> yes/no/maybe?  
> 
> >yes  
> 
> Hill owner will ***<u>NOT</u>*** be banned automatically.
> 

I added the bold.

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> I added the bold.
> 

You've just edited a system log.
Shush.

>

> 3 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> > MDZhB  
> 
> Incorrect default value. Ignored.  
> 
> > The Minmus Derp  
> 
> Incorrect default value. Ignored.

> Undefined hill owner.

> Hill owner will be automatically banned.

> yes/no/maybe?  
> 
> >yes  
> 
> Hill owner will be banned automatically.
> 

Virtual hills are for losers. My hill is real and therefore uncomputerized.

As this thread is about a virtual hill, this means that you have officially abandoned the competition.

As nobody can check "reality" of your "real" hill, everyone takes it virtually, so you lose your virtual real hill as well.

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> As this thread is about a virtual hill, this means that you have officially abandoned the competition.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> As nobody can check "reality" of your "real" hill, everyone takes it virtually, so you lose your virtual real hill as well.
> 

Oh? This thread is about a virtual hill? Ha, what an obvious fallacy. Of course the thread is virtual, but that doesn't mean the hill is! I simply can't accept that all this would be taking place over a mere virtual hill. In addition, there are so many hills that we could be discussing, that there is really no reason to create a virtual hill anyway.

It would seem that it is *you* who has abandoned the competition, my misguided friend. I will laugh at you from atop **my** hill.

As I didn't take part in the competition, mostly advocating for destructive forces of Nature, I can't leave it.

But yes, I can hear someone's laughter on the top of a nearby volcano.

> 
> 
> 7 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> As I didn't take part in the competition, mostly advocating for destructive forces of Nature, I can't leave it.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> But yes, I can hear someone's laughter on the top of a nearby volcano.
> 

It was not a volcano before I stepped upon it. Think on that, advocate for destruction.

Of course it wasn't looking like a volcano, otherwise you wouldn't.

Exactly about such cases they say "watch where you step".

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-19T17:10:33Z" title="06/19/2018 05:10  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 19, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

I drain all of your batteries. I take the hill while you are recharging. 

After that, I run: /del user:Kerbiloid user: MDZhB

The selected users are permanently deleted. Now, only [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) opposes me.

My hill

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-19T17:31:57Z" title="06/19/2018 05:31  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 19, 2018</time> by Fraston**
I drain the water table. [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/) dies of thirst. I take the hill. My hill!

I am a robot god. I don't need water.

Still my hill.
I am immortal. I take away all your joint grease. You cannot move. I take the hill.
